languages.text: {n}Слуга несколько раз оглядывается по сторонам, подступает к вам ближе и переходит на шепот:{/n} "Я слышал, что {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} оскорбил{rt_mf|ся|ась}{/d}, что с {rt_mf|ним|ней} посмел говорить скоморох, и побил{rt_mf||а} того. Было такое, Мейв?"
languages.translation_comment:
ударили скомороха в диалоге Entry
Костлявый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: {n}Слуга несколько раз оглядывается по сторонам, подступает к вам ближе и переходит на шепот:{/n} "Я слышал, что {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} оскорбил{rt_mf|ся|ась}{/d}, что с {rt_mf|ним|ней} посмел говорить скоморох, и побил{rt_mf||а} того. Было такое, Мейв?"
traits.speaker: FW_GossipingCommoner3

languages.translation_comment:
ударили скомороха в диалоге Entry
Костлявый простолюдин

languages.text: {n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}Слуга несколько раз оглядывается по сторонам, подступает к вам ближе и переходит на шепот:{/n} "Я слышал, что {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} оскорбил{rt_mf|ся|ась}{/d}, что с {rt_mf|ним|ней} посмел говорить скоморох, и побил{rt_mf||а} того. Было такое, Мейв?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant looks around him several times, steps up closer to you, and lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "I've heard the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended at the court fool daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and beat him up. Was that what happened, Maive?"

{n}The servant looks around him several times, steps up closer to you, and lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "I've heard the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended at the court fool daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and beat him up. Was that what happened, Maive?"

{n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "I heard the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Was that what happened, Maive?"

{n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "I heard the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Was that what happened, Maive?"

{n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"

languages.text: {n}眼前的仆人四处张望了好几次，随后靠了过来，低声开了口。{/n}“我听说，那位来自上界的大人因为小丑和{d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}{rt_mf|他|她}说话就大发雷霆{/d}，还把他揍了一顿。是这样吗，梅芙？”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的仆人四处张望了好几次，随后靠了过来，低声开了口。{/n}“我听说，那位来自上界的大人因为小丑和{rt_mf|他|她}说话就大发雷霆，还把他揍了一顿。是这样吗，梅芙？”
{n}眼前的仆人四处张望了好几次，随后靠了过来，低声开了口。{/n}“我听说，那位来自上界的大人因为小丑和{rt_mf|他|她}说话就大发雷霆，还把他揍了一顿。是这样吗，梅芙？”

languages.text: {n}El sirviente mira repetidamente a su alrededor, se acerca a ti y susurra:{/n} «He oído que {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}{rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} se ofendió{/d} con el bufón de la corte, que había osado hablar con {rt_mf|él|ella}, y que lo apaleó. ¿Es cierto, Maive?».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sirviente mira repetidamente a su alrededor, se acerca a ti y susurra:{/n} «He oído que {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} se ofendió con el bufón de la corte, que había osado hablar con {rt_mf|él|ella}, y que lo apaleó. ¿Es cierto, Maive?».

{n}El sirviente mira repetidamente a su alrededor, se acerca a ti y susurra:{/n} «He oído que {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} se ofendió con el bufón de la corte, que había osado hablar con {rt_mf|él|ella}, y que lo apaleó. ¿Es cierto, Maive?».

languages.text: {n}Hizmetkâr, birkaç kez etrafına bakıyor ve sana iyice yaklaşıp kulağına fısıldıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} saray soytarısı onunla konuşmaya cüret ettiği için gücendiğini{/d} ve sonra onu dövdüğünü duydum. Öyle mi oldu Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetkâr, birkaç kez etrafına bakıyor ve sana iyice yaklaşıp kulağına fısıldıyor.{/n} "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} saray soytarısı onunla konuşmaya cüret ettiği için gücendiğini ve sonra onu dövdüğünü duydum. Öyle mi oldu Maive?"

{n}Hizmetkâr, birkaç kez etrafına bakıyor ve sana iyice yaklaşıp kulağına fısıldıyor.{/n} "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} saray soytarısı onunla konuşmaya cüret ettiği için gücendiğini ve sonra onu dövdüğünü duydum. Öyle mi oldu Maive?"

languages.text: {n}使用人は周囲に気をつけて、あなたに近づき、囁く。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は生意気にも話しかけた{/d}宮廷道化師に気分を悪くされ、彼を殴ったと聞いたよ。そうだったんだろ、メイヴ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}使用人は周囲に気をつけて、あなたに近づき、囁く。{/n}「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は生意気にも話しかけた宮廷道化師に気分を悪くされ、彼を殴ったと聞いたよ。そうだったんだろ、メイヴ？」
{n}使用人は周囲に気をつけて、あなたに近づき、囁く。{/n}「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は生意気にも話しかけた宮廷道化師に気分を悪くされ、彼を殴ったと聞いたよ。そうだったんだろ、メイヴ？」

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur regarde plusieurs fois autour de lui avant de se rapprocher et de vous murmurer :{/n} « On raconte que {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}{rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste s'est {rt_mf|senti offensé|sentie offensée}{/d} quand le bouffon de la cour a osé lui adresser la parole... et du coup, {rt_mf|il|elle} l'a passé à tabac. Ça s'est vraiment passé comme ça, Maive ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serviteur regarde plusieurs fois autour de lui avant de se rapprocher et de vous murmurer :{/n} « On raconte que {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste s'est {mf|senti offensé|sentie offensée} quand le bouffon de la cour a osé lui adresser la parole... et du coup, {rt_mf|il|elle} l'a passé à tabac. Ça s'est vraiment passé comme ça, Maive ? »

{n}Le serviteur regarde plusieurs fois autour de lui avant de se rapprocher et de vous murmurer :{/n} « On raconte que {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste s'est {rt_mf|senti offensé|sentie offensée} quand le bouffon de la cour a osé lui adresser la parole... et du coup, {rt_mf|il|elle} l'a passé à tabac. Ça s'est vraiment passé comme ça, Maive ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Diener sieht sich mehrmals um, tritt näher an dich heran und flüstert:{/n} "Ich habe gehört, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}{rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} war beleidigt{/d}, weil der Hofnarr es gewagt hat, mit {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} zu sprechen, und hat ihn dann verprügelt. Ist das wirklich wahr, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant looks about him several times, steps closer to you, and whispers,{/n} "I heard the {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyHitBuffonDecision}Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} was offended{/d} at the court fool for daring to speak to {rt_mf|him|her}, and then beat him up. Is that what happened, Maive?"

Ist das wirklich wahr, Maive?"
